name: Failed SSH Login
suggested_treatment: Investigate IP and user, consider blocking IP if repeated failures

name: Successful Root SSH Login
suggested_treatment: Check if root login is allowed; use key-based login and disable password login for root

name: User Added to Sudoers
suggested_treatment: Verify if new sudo access is authorized

name: SSH Login from Unknown IP
suggested_treatment: Verify IP, consider restricting SSH access by IP

name: Repeated Failed SSH Attempts
suggested_treatment: Enable fail2ban or block suspicious IPs

name: SUID File Created
suggested_treatment: Check if new SUID files are authorized

name: User Account Locked
suggested_treatment: Verify the reason for locking and ensure user should be locked

name: Failed Cron Job
suggested_treatment: Check cron jobs for misconfiguration or errors

name: System Reboot
suggested_treatment: Ensure reboot was authorized

name: Kernel Error
suggested_treatment: Investigate kernel errors and system stability

name: Unauthorized File Deletion
suggested_treatment: Verify deletion was authorized

name: SSH Key Added
suggested_treatment: Check if new SSH key is authorized

name: Password Changed
suggested_treatment: Confirm password changes are authorized

name: Failed Sudo Attempt
suggested_treatment: Investigate failed sudo attempts

name: Suspicious Process Started
suggested_treatment: Investigate suspicious interactive shell execution

name: Network Connection to Unknown IP
suggested_treatment: Investigate unknown network connection

name: User Account Created
suggested_treatment: Verify if the new user account is authorized

name: Root Privilege Escalation Attempt
suggested_treatment: Investigate unauthorized privilege escalation

name: Suspicious Cron Job Added
suggested_treatment: Check if new cron job is authorized

name: Failed Mount Attempt
suggested_treatment: Verify mount operation and permissions

name: SSH Connection Closed Unexpectedly
suggested_treatment: Investigate SSH session termination

name: Privilege Escalation via Sudo
suggested_treatment: Ensure sudo escalation is authorized

name: Failed Login Lockout Triggered
suggested_treatment: Check if lockout triggered correctly or suspicious activity

name: File Permission Changed
suggested_treatment: Verify permission changes are authorized

name: Service Started
suggested_treatment: Check if service start was authorized

name: Service Stopped
suggested_treatment: Check if service stop was authorized

name: SSH Brute Force Detected
suggested_treatment: Enable fail2ban or block IPs with repeated failures

name: Kernel Panic
suggested_treatment: Investigate kernel panic and fix underlying issue

name: Disk Full Warning
suggested_treatment: Clean disk space and monitor storage

name: Unauthorized Package Installed
suggested_treatment: Verify package installation was authorized

name: Root Login via Console
suggested_treatment: Check if console root login is authorized

name: Failed SFTP Upload
suggested_treatment: Check SFTP errors and permissions

name: Firewall Disabled
suggested_treatment: Enable firewall and verify rules

name: Unauthorized Cron Modification
suggested_treatment: Verify cron job edits are authorized

name: Failed Sudo Session
suggested_treatment: Check failed sudo attempts

name: SELinux Denial
suggested_treatment: Review SELinux logs and fix policies

name: SSH Port Scan Detected
suggested_treatment: Investigate scanning activity

name: Unexpected Software Removal
suggested_treatment: Verify removal was authorized

name: User Password Expired
suggested_treatment: Notify user and enforce password change

name: Suspicious Cron Execution
suggested_treatment: Verify if cron job execution is authorized

name: Unauthorized File Access
suggested_treatment: Check who tried to access the file and permissions

name: Multiple Failed Login Attempts
suggested_treatment: Consider temporary lockout or blocking IPs

name: Unexpected System Shutdown
suggested_treatment: Investigate reason for shutdown

name: Unauthorized SUID Modification
suggested_treatment: Check SUID changes

name: Core Dump Generated
suggested_treatment: Investigate crash and potential security implications

name: SSH Connection from Blacklisted IP
suggested_treatment: Block unauthorized IP

name: System Time Changed
suggested_treatment: Verify if time change is authorized

name: Unauthorized Package Update
suggested_treatment: Verify updates are authorized

name: SELinux Policy Change
suggested_treatment: Check policy change is authorized

name: Unexpected Service Restart
suggested_treatment: Confirm service restart is authorized
